sentences.en: A black coat always looks smart and will never date.
sentences.cn: 黑色外套看起来总是很潇洒，而且永远也不会落伍。

sentences.en: a dog with a glossy coat
sentences.cn: 皮毛光滑的狗

sentences.en: A layer of snow coated the trees.
sentences.cn: 树上覆盖着一层雪。

sentences.en: Billy! Put your coat on , it’s cold outside!
sentences.cn: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.en: Billy! Put your coat on, it’s cold outside!
sentences.cn: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.en: He cleaned the flakes away with his coat sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他用大衣袖子把碎屑掸掉。

sentences.en: He dug into his coat pocket for his keys.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进上衣口袋里摸钥匙。

sentences.en: He was faultlessly attired in black coat and striped trousers.
sentences.cn: 他穿着黑色上衣和条纹裤子，简直无可挑剔。

sentences.en: I need a new winter coat .
sentences.cn: 我需要一件新的冬衣。

sentences.en: I need a new winter coat.
sentences.cn: 我需要一件新的冬衣。

sentences.en: I opened my coat and let him see the belt.
sentences.cn: 我解开外衣，让他看那条皮带。

sentences.en: I'll bet you walked off with my coat, too.
sentences.cn: 我打赌你还顺手拿走了我的大衣。

sentences.en: I'll take my coat upstairs. Shall I take yours, Roberta?
sentences.cn: 我要把我的外套拿到楼上去。罗伯塔，要我把你的也拿上去吗？

sentences.en: Natasha took the coat and draped it over her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 娜塔莎拿起外套披在肩上。

sentences.en: She came down the stairs slowly, trailing the coat behind her.
sentences.cn: 她慢慢走下楼梯，大衣在身后拖曳着。

sentences.en: She was kitted out with winter coat, skirts, jumpers.
sentences.cn: 她全副武装，穿着冬天的外套、裙子、套头衫。

sentences.en: She was wearing a black coat with a white collar.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件白领黑外套。

sentences.en: The front door needs a new coat of paint.
sentences.cn: 前门需要刷一层新漆了。

sentences.en: The kids took off their coats and threw them on the floor.
sentences.cn: 孩子们脱下外套扔在地板上。

sentences.en: The lab assistants wear long white coats.
sentences.cn: 实验室助手穿着白色的长外套。

sentences.en: Then she stood up, wrapping her coat around her angrily.
sentences.cn: 然后她站了起来，怒气冲冲地穿上大衣。

sentences.en: There was a stained-glass window with the family coat of arms.
sentences.cn: 有一扇饰有家族盾形纹章的彩色玻璃窗。

sentences.en: They accused him of riding on the coat-tails of the president.
sentences.cn: 他们指责他是沾了总统的光。

words.tran_cn: 上涂料的，上胶的；穿外套的，覆盖着的
给…穿上外衣；盖上（coat的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 外套，大衣，（动物）皮毛，涂料层
trans.tran_en: a piece of clothing with long sleeves that is worn over your clothes to protect them or to keep you warm
a piece of clothing with long sleeves that is worn over your clothes to protect them or to keep you warm
to cover something with a thin layer of something else
